Talk_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0501>I'll never fix the Skyview Tower at
this rate.<sp:5:0:0>
Talk_02:
<sp:3:0:2:0a01><snd:Think_00>That flying monster took the terminal
from the Skyview Tower.
Talk_28:
<sp:3:0:2:0401><snd:Notice>Ah,<sp:5:0:0> well, you look busy.<sp:5:1:0> I'm pretty busy
too. I'm off to work at the next site.
Like they say, "Son and done"!
Talk_03:
<sp:3:0:2:0901><snd:Angry_01>Good grief.<sp:5:1:0> That sticky-clawed terror has
a habit of stealing things.
Talk_04:
<sp:3:0:2:0a01><snd:Sad>That rascal doesn't miss a thing.<sp:5:0:0> If it
notices us, it'll fly away and be more
on guard...
Talk_05: <sp:3:0:2:0801><snd:Happy_01>Mister! You got the tower's terminal back!
Talk_19: <sp:3:0:2:0a01><snd:Think>Uh-oh. I've lost sight of the monster...
Talk_07:
<sp:3:0:2:0101>There! That's not going anywhere,<sp:5:0:0> even if
a monster is real determined.
Talk_08:
<sp:3:0:2:0101><snd:Greeting>You can see Tarrey Town from here.
I wonder how everyone is doing...
Talk_40:
<sp:3:0:2:0401>Mister, you got the terminal back!<sp:5:0:0> That
flying rascal was the worst.
Talk_41:
<sp:3:0:2:0a01><snd:Think>This is really bad...<sp:5:0:0> Where in the world
did it go?
Talk_42:
<sp:3:0:2:0a00>The terminal for this Skyview Tower, the
one that monster stole...

That creature dropped the terminal,
and it fell around here somewhere.
But I lost sight of it!
Talk_43:
<sp:3:0:2:0a00>The terminal...<sp:5:0:0>must have fallen
somewhere though.<sp:5:0:0> I can't fix this
Skyview Tower without it.
Talk_44:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00>You can't see Tarrey Town in this
weather, unfortunately.
Talk_32:
<sp:3:0:2:0801><snd:Happy>I look up to President Hudson so much.
I can't help it!<sp:5:1:0> I can only hope to be half
as important as him someday.
Talk_45:
<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:TalkPositive_01>But it's over there.<sp:5:1:0> You'd be able to see
it if the weather was nicer.
Talk_33:
<sp:3:0:2:0a01><snd:Think>I can't fix the Skyview Tower without the
terminal that monster's holding.
Talk_20:
<sp:3:0:2:0101>The president of our construction
company lives there. He built up that
town from nothing. <sp:5:0:0>Hudson is brilliant!
<sp:3:0:2:0801><snd:Happy>Oh,<sp:5:0:0> I can't help looking up to him.<sp:0:4:0>I can only hope to be half as important
as Hudson is someday.
Talk_34:
<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:TalkPositive_00>Please, mister,<sp:5:0:0> would you maybe move
the terminal over there for me?
Talk_21:
<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:TalkPositive_01>Just over there...<sp:5:1:0> Can you make out all
of the houses?
Talk_35:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>I'll repair the terminal once it's in place.<sp:5:0:0>
Sorry to ask for even more help!
Talk_36:
<sp:3:0:2:0801><snd:Happy_00>You really helped me out!<sp:5:0:0> I'll get the
terminal up and running in the Skyview
Tower right away!
Talk_10:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>Let's install it in the Skyview Tower.
No time to waste!
Talk_37:
<sp:3:0:2:0a01><snd:Think>The tower's terminal is too heavy for
me. I just can't move it where it needs
to go.
Talk_11:
<sp:3:0:2:0801><snd:TalkPositive_01>I couldn't have done it without you!<sp:5:0:0>
I really appreciate it.
Talk_12:
<sp:3:0:2:0501>If you <clr:0000>hide out of view<clr:ffff>, it may <clr:0000>lower its
guard and come down<clr:ffff>.<sp:5:0:0> It's too clever and
quick to rush.
Talk_00: <sp:3:0:2:0301><snd:Sad_01>Sorry.<sp:5:1:0> You stopped by at a rough time.
Talk_39:
<sp:3:0:2:0801><snd:Happy_00>Thanks!<sp:5:0:0> That really helped me out.


<sp:3:0:2:0101>And to carry such a heavy thing on
your own too.

<sp:3:0:2:0a01><snd:Think_01>I'd have a hard time moving that
by myself.
Talk_13:
<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:TalkPositive_00>That's where Hudson Construction is
locatedâ€”the crew that I work for.
